Description: Dr Mahdi Aljallabi was accused of submitting a plagiarised article and providing false declarations in an application for medical training, which he admitted constituted dishonesty.

Name: Dr Michael GOODWIN
Description: Dr. Michael Goodwin was accused of inappropriately self-administering a controlled substance while working as a consultant anaesthetist and dishonestly entering inaccurate information on the controlled drugs register to conceal his use of the substance.

Name: Dr Cian HUGHES
Description: Dr. Cian Hughes was accused of pursuing an improper emotional and sexual relationship with a minor patient, which included sending inappropriate messages and engaging in sexual activities.

Name: Dr Johnathan SAUNDERS
Description: Dr Johnathan Saunders was accused of misconduct related to practicing dentistry without registration, performing an inadequate cosmetic procedure, and subsequently harassing a patient to conceal his actions.

Name: Dr Satnam LIDDER
Description: Dr. Satnam Lidder was accused of making offensive and homophobic comments to a colleague, Dr. A, and of providing false information to the Royal College of Physicians in an attempt to discredit Dr. A after the latter raised concerns about Lidder's behavior.

Name: Dr Callum METCALFE
Description: Dr. Callum Metcalfe was accused of misconduct related to dishonestly obtaining medication by presenting a false prescription and was also convicted of being in charge of a vehicle while under the influence of alcohol.

Name: Dr David ADAMS
Description: Dr. David Adams was accused of serious misconduct for failing to declare a criminal conviction for drink driving during his application to restore his medical registration and for providing dishonest answers related to this conviction.

Name: Dr Mark O'FLYNN
Description: Dr. Mark O'Flynn was accused of misconduct related to his failure to provide necessary documentation and evidence for his case during the tribunal proceedings.

Name: Dr Mohammad SOHAIL
Description: Dr Mohammad Sohail was accused of acting dishonestly regarding the care he provided to a patient and failing to disclose his regulatory history in a job application, as well as sending malicious and racially offensive communications to a woman he met online.

Name: Dr Kevin NEWLEY
Description: Dr. Kevin Newley was accused of failing to provide good care to patients, including communication failures, poor record keeping, and not sharing information with colleagues.

Name: Dr Anatta NERGUI
Description: Dr Anatta Nergui was accused of engaging in a course of conduct that caused fear or alarm and resisting police officers, which included harassment and sending numerous alarming communications to an individual.

Name: Dr Bobby SHABBIR
Description: Dr Bobby Shabbir was accused of dishonestly answering questions on his GMC registration application regarding his fitness to practice, specifically failing to disclose his previous suspension as a solicitor due to disciplinary action.

Name: Dr Mohammad MOHAMMAD
Description: Dr Mohammad was accused of providing inadequate care to two patients, leading to a misdiagnosis of ectopic pregnancy for Patient A and the misinterpretation of fetal monitoring for Patient B, resulting in a tragic outcome.

Name: Dr Saadia Kamran RAO
Description: Dr. Saadia Kamran Rao was accused of engaging in dishonest conduct during the treatment of a patient, including providing false information about the volume of cerebrospinal fluid aspirated and altering medical records.

Name: Mr Karl HATTOTUWA
Description: Mr. Hattotuwa was accused of failing to provide adequate clinical care to 14 patients, which included issues related to supervision, record keeping, advice, informed consent, and communication, as well as being dishonest in completing a funding request form for a procedure.

Name: Dr Keyur BUCH
Description: Dr Keyur Buch was accused of posting inappropriate comments on social media that demonstrated and encouraged racial and religious hostility, particularly against Islam and the Pakistani race.

Name: Dr Simon MORAN
Description: Dr. Simon Moran was accused of dishonestly prescribing medications to himself and a person with whom he had a close personal relationship, using a prescription pad that did not belong to him.

Name: Dr Mujtaba GHAUS
Description: Dr Mujtaba GHAUS was accused of misconduct.

Name: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR
Description: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR was involved in a costs application hearing before the tribunal.

Name: Dr Ahmed ABDELRAHMAN
Description: Dr Ahmed Abdelrahman was accused of engaging in unwanted sexual conduct towards a colleague, including inappropriate physical contact and sexual harassment.

Name: Dr Aftab GILL
Description: Dr Aftab Gill was accused of working without a valid medical license and providing falsified documentation regarding the status of his license to his employer.

Name: Dr Elliot WELLS
Description: No determination available

Name: Dr James ALLISON
Description: Dr. James Allison was accused of completing a Firearms Licensing Medical Information Proforma with untrue statements and inappropriately using the practice stamp when he was not acting as a GP.

Name: Dr Kapila Shankapani BENARAGAMA
Description: Dr Kapila Shankapani Benaragama was accused of inappropriate conduct towards a colleague, including sexual harassment and abuse of his senior position.

Name: Dr Samuel JOHNSON
Description: Dr Samuel Johnson was accused of dishonestly creating a false workplace-based assessment in another doctor's name and attempting to cover up his actions by impersonating that doctor.

Name: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR
Description: Dr Thangavelu Senthil Kumar was accused of dishonestly presenting himself as another doctor online to gain access to a private group for medical professionals during the Covid-19 pandemic.

Name: Dr Khaled ABDEL AZIZ
Description: Dr Khaled Abdel Aziz was accused of touching a minor, Miss A, without her consent at the Reading Festival, with allegations that his actions were sexually motivated.

Name: Dr Mohamed RAMADAN
Description: Dr Mohamed Ramadan was accused of pursuing a sexual and improper emotional relationship with a vulnerable patient and inappropriately accessing the patient's medical records.

Name: Dr Jane HORNSEY
Description: Dr Jane Hornsey was accused of having her fitness to practice impaired due to a conviction for driving a motor vehicle after consuming alcohol exceeding the prescribed limit.

Name: Dr Lawrence ARMSTRONG
Description: Dr. Lawrence Armstrong was accused of burglary and possession of a controlled drug, having targeted his former workplace to steal controlled substances.

Name: Dr Michael ISIMA
Description: Dr. Michael Isima was accused of non-compliance with a performance assessment following concerns about his clinical performance, including poor communication skills and a serious incident resulting in a neonatal death.

Name: Dr Nathaniel KNOX CARTWRIGHT
Description: Dr Nathaniel Knox Cartwright was accused of consuming alcohol while on call, impairing his ability to perform surgery and provide safe patient care.

Name: Dr Babatunde ARANMOLATE
Description: Dr. Babatunde Aranmolate was accused of removing medications from Hillingdon Hospitals NHS Trust without entitlement and providing them to a non-patient, while also attempting to solicit false statements from colleagues regarding the incident.

Name: Dr Siong LEE
Description: Dr. Siong Lee was accused of making false entries in a patient's medical records and providing misleading information in a letter regarding the patient's care and treatment, despite the patient having raised concerns about the care received.

Name: Dr Shah ALI
Description: Dr Shah Ali was accused of dishonesty for providing false information on a Disclosure and Barring Service Declaration Form regarding his fitness to practice investigation related to a dangerous driving conviction.

Name: Dr Joel DANJUMA
Description: Dr. Joel Danjuma was accused of inappropriately touching Patient A during examinations, with allegations of sexual motivation behind his actions.

Name: Dr Manoj NARAYAN
Description: Dr Manoj Narayan was accused of making sexually motivated comments and engaging in physical contact with a colleague, which constituted harassment on the grounds of gender and sexual orientation.

Name: Dr Sotirios FOUTSIZOGLOU
Description: Dr Sotirios Foutsizoglou was accused of dishonestly claiming authorship of several research documents and falsely stating that he had obtained a PhD from Harvard in his job applications.

Name: Dr Christopher STEER
Description: Dr Christopher Steer was accused of engaging in a sexual relationship with a patient while she remained under his care and failing to declare an ongoing GMC investigation on an appraisal form.

Name: Mr Ghulam MALIK
Description: Mr. Ghulam Malik was accused of serious misconduct due to his persistent and repeated unsubstantiated grievances against colleagues, which undermined effective working relationships and brought the profession into disrepute.

Name: Dr Kelechi OPARA
Description: Dr Kelechi Opara was accused of dishonestly submitting time sheets for shifts he did not work, thereby defrauding the NHS.

Name: Dr Omoaga MUNIS
Description: Dr Omoaga Munis was accused of submitting fraudulent identity documents to gain employment as a doctor, which led to her conviction for possession of identity documents with intent.

Name: Dr Adele RITCHIE
Description: Dr. Adele Ritchie was accused of having unacceptable professional performance in areas including maintaining professional performance, assessment of patients' condition, clinical management, and record-keeping.

Name: Dr Edward FINN
Description: Dr Edward Finn was accused of multiple serious offenses including taking and making indecent photographs of children, voyeurism, and assaulting a girl under 13 by touching, leading to his conviction and sentencing.

Name: Dr Sarah ALAM
Description: No determination available

Name: Dr Muhammad Asad HAROON
Description: Dr Muhammad Asad Haroon was accused of controlling or coercive behaviour in an intimate or family relationship, leading to his conviction at Swansea Crown Court.

Name: Dr Amitabh KUMAR
Description: Dr Amitabh Kumar was accused of sexual assault against a minor and failing to notify the General Medical Council of his conviction.

Name: Dr Thabo MILLER
Description: Dr. Thabo Miller was accused of assaulting Ms. A, which included using offensive language, attempting to damage her car, and physically assaulting her, resulting in a conviction for assault by beating.

Name: Dr Ahmed ELSHAFEY
Description: Dr Ahmed Elshafey was accused of making inappropriate remarks and engaging in unprofessional conduct towards female patients, including complimenting their appearance and inappropriately touching them.

Name: Dr Shehzada NAZIR
Description: Dr Shehzada Nazir was accused of misconduct for failing to adequately assess a patient during a consultation, making inappropriate comments, and not taking necessary actions to ensure the patient's safety, including failing to record the patient's suicidal thoughts.

Name: Dr Bervin TEO CHONG WEI
Description: Dr Bervin Teo Chong Wei was accused of dishonestly presenting himself as a consultant at a hospital to obtain a blood sample, despite knowing he was no longer employed there and lacked permission to access the hospital's computer system.

Name: Dr Gamal MOHAMED
Description: Dr Gamal Mohamed was accused of deficient professional performance, specifically regarding his clinical capabilities and management of patient care.

Name: Dr Andrew THILLAINAYAGAM
Description: Dr Andrew Thillainayagam was accused of failing to adequately assess a patient during their hospital admission and of maintaining inadequate record keeping regarding the patient's care, which contributed to the patient's deterioration and subsequent death.

Name: Dr John MCCLELLAND
Area: North Tyneside, Mid and East Antrim
Description: Dr. John McClelland was accused of serious misconduct involving dishonesty related to fraudulent prescription practices and a conviction for making false representations.

Name: Dr Thomas HERBST
Description: Dr. Thomas Herbst was accused of attending work while unfit, having fallen asleep during a procedure where he was responsible for an anaesthetised patient, and exhibiting incoherent behavior.

Name: Dr Herjyot DHARNI
Description: Dr Herjyot DharnI was accused of failing to disclose her work to the GMC and Health Education England, providing false information in her application for a training program, and leaving a shift early without informing colleagues, which resulted in a lack of support for a junior doctor.

Name: Dr Muhammad MALIK
Description: Dr Muhammad Malik was accused of submitting falsified Patient Feedback Questionnaires as part of his revalidation process, which he admitted was dishonest.

Name: Dr Richard BOWLEY
Description: Dr. Richard Bowley was accused of accessing and viewing the medical records of a patient, who was also a professional colleague, without permission and without legitimate justification.

Name: Dr Srinivasa Rao KUNA
Description: Dr Srinivasa Rao Kuna was accused of dishonestly recording his role as 'surgeon' in a Training Log during a performance review, knowing that these entries were false.

Name: Dr Lorraine HUTCHINSON-GALE
Description: Dr Lorraine Hutchinson-Gale was accused of undertaking simultaneous shifts for two different healthcare providers, HUC and PPG, knowing that she should not have done so, which was alleged to be dishonest conduct.

Name: Dr Alexandra KENNARD
Description: Dr Alexandra Kennard was accused of failing to disclose a criminal conviction for driving under the influence of alcohol and possessing a prohibited weapon, as well as making dishonest statements regarding her driving status.

Name: Dr Mili SHAH
Description: Dr Mili Shah was accused of failing to provide good clinical care to patients and making an antisemitic comment that constituted harassment.

Name: Dr Dharmesh SHAH
Description: Dr. Dharmesh Shah was accused of serious misconduct related to inappropriate breast examinations and failure to obtain consent from patients, as well as not maintaining adequate clinical records.

Name: Dr George ZENG
Description: Dr. George Zeng was accused of voyeurism for recording a private act without consent, which constituted a criminal offense under the Sexual Offences Act 2003.

Name: Dr Isaac BAIDOO
Description: Dr. Isaac Baidoo was accused of submitting false sick notes and working while on sick leave, which constituted dishonesty and misconduct.

Name: Dr Paul JACKSON
Description: Dr. Paul Jackson was accused of having an unacceptable professional performance in the domain of 'Maintaining Professional Performance' following a General Medical Council assessment.

Name: Dr Daman SHARMA
Description: Dr. Daman Sharma was accused of multiple incidents of sexual misconduct and harassment towards eight female colleagues and two patients, as well as dishonesty regarding allegations made against him.

Name: Dr Maxwell DUGBOYELE
Description: Dr Maxwell Dugboyele was accused of persistent sexual harassment at work towards junior, female colleagues, which included an abuse of professional position and unlawful sexual harassment.

Name: Dr Thirumurugan SUNDARESAN
Description: Dr Thirumurugan Sundaresan was accused of dishonestly making false representations regarding patient records and instructing others to create misleading entries in the EMIS system, which led to his conviction for fraud.

Name: Dr Faisal PATEL
Description: Dr Faisal Patel was accused of making dishonest amendments to a patient's medical records to avoid criticism of his care, specifically failing to indicate that the amendments were made retrospectively.

Name: Dr Astrit RRUKAJ
Description: Dr Astrit Rrukaj was accused of behaving inappropriately towards a colleague, Ms A, including multiple sexual advances without her consent during an encounter on 13 August 2021.

Name: Dr Kausik RAY
Description: Dr Kausik Ray was accused of sexual assault after inappropriately touching a female colleague without her consent during a consultation at the hospital where he worked.

Name: Dr Sachin MANORAJ
Description: Dr Sachin Manoraj was accused of dishonesty for failing to disclose ongoing police investigations and two criminal convictions on application forms during his medical training.

Name: Dr Osman HAJAHMED
Description: Dr Osman Hajahmed was accused of causing Actual Bodily Harm to Ms A by striking her with a stick multiple times.

Name: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR
Description: Dr Thangavelu Senthil Kumar was accused of dishonestly presenting himself as another doctor online to gain access to a private group for medical professionals during the Covid-19 pandemic.

Name: Dr George Akinkunle LAWSON
Description: Dr George Akinkunle Lawson was accused of multiple counts of assault and behaving in a threatening or abusive manner, resulting in criminal convictions.

Name: Dr Mouhammad SULTAN
Description: Dr Mouhammad Sultan was accused of dishonestly failing to disclose his undertakings with the GMC while working at a hospital, and for not completing a required work details form despite multiple requests.

Name: Dr Peter WILCOCK
Description: Dr. Peter Wilcock was involved in a tribunal regarding a new conviction or caution.

Name: Dr Eno UMOTONG
Description: Dr Eno Umotong was accused of driving while disqualified, exceeding the speed limit, failing to stop at a red traffic light, and providing false information to a police officer.

Name: Dr Samuel OJO
Description: Dr Samuel OJO was accused of smoking cannabis while on shift at a hospital, while caring for vulnerable mental health patients.

Name: Dr Varaha Vijaya Nageswara KONATHALA
Description: No determination available

Name: Dr Chikaodinaka OKOLO
Description: Dr Chikaodinaka Okolo was accused of misconduct related to self-prescribing, issuing fraudulent prescriptions, and receiving a police caution for possession of a Class A drug.

Name: Dr Touseef SAFDAR
Description: Dr Touseef Safdar was accused of being dishonest in written and oral evidence provided during court proceedings, specifically regarding the inclusion of false information in a witness statement.

Name: Dr Odunayo ODEWOLE
Description: Dr. Odunayo Odewole was accused of failing to notify the GMC of his criminal convictions and dishonestly declaring that he had no convictions when applying for a position with NES Healthcare.

Name: Dr Sameed ZAHID
Description: Dr Sameed Zahid was accused of submitting false information and documents regarding his post-graduate internship in China when applying for full registration with the GMC, knowing that these claims were untrue.

Name: Dr Ijaz HAYAT
Description: Dr Ijaz Hayat was accused of dishonestly making fraudulent claims on his critical illness and travel insurance, including providing misleading information regarding his health history.

Name: Dr Kristan Jotin VEDI
Description: Dr Kristan Jotin Vedi was accused of forming an inappropriate personal relationship with a vulnerable former patient, which included giving her money, sending inappropriate messages, and sharing inappropriate images via social media.

Name: Dr Yogesh PARASHAR
Area: Sunderland, County Durham, Swindon, Newcastle upon Tyne
Description: Dr Yogesh Parashar was accused of consulting with patients while under the influence of alcohol, failing to provide adequate care and treatment, and engaging in sexually motivated harassment towards a staff member.

Name: Dr Ali SHOKOUH-AMIRI
Description: Dr. Ali Shokouh-Amiri was accused of inappropriate behavior and substandard clinical care towards multiple patients, including sexual misconduct and dishonesty in medical documentation.

Name: Dr Lina SIMAVICIUTE
Description: Dr Lina Simaviciute was accused of failing to comply with a GMC-directed Performance Assessment, which raised concerns about her clinical knowledge, skills, and communication abilities.

Name: Dr Ioannis TOSOUNIDIS
Description: Dr Ioannis Tosounidis was accused of deficient professional performance and misconduct, including misleading and dishonest actions related to pathology reports and job applications.

Name: Dr Syed Majid Hussain ZAIDI
Description: Dr Syed Majid Hussain ZAIDI was accused of misconduct and impairment related to his professional conduct.

Name: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR
Description: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR was involved in a tribunal regarding misconduct, with the outcome being an adjournment for a new tribunal to consider the substantive matters.

Name: Dr Trevor MILLIGAN
Description: Dr Trevor Milligan was accused of being under the influence of alcohol while conducting a clinic and subsequently convicted of driving a vehicle while over the legal alcohol limit.

Name: Dr Atila MORLOCAN
Description: Dr Atila Morlocan was accused of failing to provide good clinical care, including serious prescribing errors and inadequate record keeping, which put patient safety at risk.

Name: Dr Kazal OMAR
Description: Dr Kazal Omar was accused of retrospectively altering an operation note and providing a dishonest account of a medical procedure, which included overwriting fluid output records and supplying altered documents to a patient.

Name: Dr Leonardo FASANO
Description: No determination available

Description: Dr Deepu ALKERE NANJUNDASWAMY is facing allegations related to misconduct, with the specifics of the case not yet determined.
